entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Light snow ending early this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 this evening. Temperature steady near minus 6. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Monday 16 May 2016

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon with 60 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 5. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Monday 16 May 2016
